fields.headline: Baftas 2014: what did you think?
fields.bodyText: What did you make of the 2014 Baftas? We asked @GuardianFilm Twitter followers to sum up their thoughts in a sentence – and below are a handful of the responses. A few talking points appeared repeatedly, particularly the following: • Shouldn’t 12 years a Slave have won more? • Did Gravity deserve to win that much? • Was Lupita Nyong’o robbed? • Why was James Gandolfini excluded from the tribute section? • Would Steve Coogan be a good host once Stephen Fry steps down? Whatever your thoughts, let us know your views in the thread below.
